name: Key shooter
description:
You're a key and you shoot some mini keys to unlock evil locks...

  • Controls :

Left and right keys or "a" and "d" keys to move, space to shoot (you can hold it or spam it)

  • Credits :

Code idea and graphics : A_python_dev (Me☺)

Main musics : https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle

sound effects : https://gamesupply.itch.io/1000-nintendo-sound-effects

This is a submission to the monthly jam #4.

If you're asking why i made a game like this, on the theme "locked" it's just that i wanted to have a simple concept, so i only have to work on the development of the game !

That game is under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
